Name: Taunt - Palefire
Desc: Taunt the Boss. Scores will be frozen during cast, but will increase massively after cast.

Name: Precision Path
Desc: Dodge successfully using a Dodge Shoot to extend your Shooting Stance and reduce the Dodge Gauge cost of your next Dodge Shoot.

Name: Silent Gladiator
Desc: Cast Taunt to enrage the Boss, making it launch a fierce attack. Receive scores at a much higher rate for 10s after cast.

Name: Scorching Speed Attack
Desc: Dodge Gauge will recover faster during Basic Attacks. Dodge will be quickly followed by the 3rd hit of Basic Attacks, which will grant bonus points.

Name: Taunt - Crimson Weave
Desc: Taunt the Boss. Scores will be frozen during cast, but will increase massively after cast.

Name: Slash of Desolation
Desc: Gain a brief window of Dodge check when the Dodge button is released and Resolute Blow is cast. Earn bonus points if you successfully dodge an enemy attack during this instant.

Name: Fading Shadow, Shattered Heart
Desc: Cast Taunt to enrage the Boss, making it launch a fierce attack. Receive scores at a much higher rate for 10s after cast.

Name: Destiny's Flash
Desc: Dodge Gauge will recover faster during Basic Attacks. Receive extra score on the last hit of your Basic Attacks.

Name: Taunt - Garnet
Desc: Taunt the Boss. Scores will be frozen during cast, but will increase massively after cast.

Name: Crackling Thunder
Desc: Consume 3 stacks of Electric Charge when you cast Lightning Fall to enter Invincibility during cast.

Name: The Flagbearer
Desc: Continue to earn points during the Post-Action of Basic Attack - Spear Lunge and Signature - Shining Piercer.

Name: Aerial Scarlet Spear
Desc: Dodge Gauge will recover faster during Basic Attacks. Earn bonus points by using Basic Attacks. Successful Parries using Spear Lunge will grant bonus points.

Name: Taunt - Solacetune
Desc: Taunt the Boss. Scores will be frozen during cast, but will increase massively after cast.

Name: Dreamlike Sonata
Desc: Gain a Super Armor when protected by a shield.

Name: Ethereal Waltz
Desc: Dodge Gauge will recover faster during Basic Attacks. Continue to earn points on the Post-Action of the last hit of your Basic Attacks.

Name: Harmonic Chord
Desc: Earn bonus points upon casting Jade Bloom: Play.

Name: Taunt - Pyroath
Desc: Taunt the Boss. Scores will be frozen during cast, but will increase massively after cast.

Name: Ashen Leap
Desc: Earn bonus points and a shield by long-pressing Dodge to block an enemy attack while on the field.

Name: Oath of Grit
Desc: Cast Taunt to enrage the Boss, making it launch a fierce attack. Earn points at a much higher rate for 10s after cast. Continue to earn points during Basic Attack Post-Action.

Name: Swift Wing Slash
Desc: Earn bonus points when you dodge successfully and land a counterattack.
